Add grid

Source: R/add_grid.R
add_grid.Rd

Add grid

Usage

add_grid(zoo, grid)

Arguments

zoo

zoo monitor tibble

grid

grid object

Value

zoo grid object

Examples

pacman::p_load(tidyverse, targets)
#> Installing package into ‘/home/runner/work/_temp/Library’
#> (as ‘lib’ is unspecified)

data(skink)
grid44 <- create_grid(range(skink$X), range(skink$Y), dim = c(4,4))
grid44
#> # A tibble: 16 × 8
